title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The 3 steps smart CEOs are taking in a volatile tariff environment, according to the head of a major global leadership advisory firm
items.description: Economic and geopolitical uncertainty are top of mind for C-suite leaders, according to the latest report on leadership advisory firm Russell Reynolds...

items.title: For Delta and Accenture CEOs, helping employees navigate trade and tariffs uncertainty fits the company culture
items.description: Accenture launched tariff education initiatives, and Delta stuck with planned pay hikes despite weaker business confidence.

items.title: PPG CEO says company is ready to navigate Trump tariff uncertainty: ‘Our top 30 suppliers for our U.S. businesses, 0 of them are Chinese’
items.description: PPG reported net sales of $3.68 billion for the quarter, a 4% decline from the year prior, impacted by foreign exchange rates and recent divestitures.

items.title: Japan’s historic work ethic is declining—45% of workers admit they’re quiet quitting
items.description: Workers said they do the basics required for their jobs for various reasons, but cite wanting a better work-life balance.

items.title: Employers hired steadily in April, unfazed by tariff announcements
items.description: U.S. employers added 177,000 jobs last month.
